reviews.review: Довольно хороша но слабой стороной является баланс
Jogo muito bom para jogar com seus amigos
Good but bad

Dead by Daylight is an extremely exciting game, especially in the honeymoon phase, making it for me a must buy if you're a fan of horror, competition, or if you have a friend with a hilarious scream.

Horror fans can have fun playing as the killers hunting down and playing mind games against the weak survivors or attempt to escape as the young teenagers being chased by Michael Myers out on Haddonfield Lane just like you were in Friday the 13th. Not the shitty game but the movie. Some killers will get less scary over time as we all can get conditioned to fear based stimulus but let me tell you that even at 330 hours, a Tier 1 super sneaky Myer still gives me a scream. Play with the lights off, you'll see better in the dark game and it adds ambiance! 

I love the competitive nature of Dead by Daylight. It's either you as the survivor, "alone" because you can't really communicate with other players in game except with simple pointing and waving emotes, against a killer with abilities designed to either trap you, hurt you, or hunt you down trying to stop you from escaping by repairing generators and leaving through the gates or the hatch. The thrill of epic chases always gets me, from both sides too! I will leave a disclaimer; At higher levels of play and in most circles there are some strategies that are considered taboo by the community for various reasons and if you engage in them players will get pretty mean. It's not right and kinda shitty, just try and report them and move on. I'm not saying facecamping is a good strategy but if you gotta get a kill, YOU GOTTA GET A KILL. If the survivors keep falling for the trick? oh well 

If you got any friends at all though, this game is awesome in either Survive with Friends where you can pair up with you friends and be able to communicate with each other in comms or you can play Kill you Friends and try out different killers, perks, items or builds in the custom game mode. I've had so much fun playing this game with my friends.

O jogo em si é realmente muito bom. Gameplay inovadora e jogabilidade boa. Simples de se pegar o jeito e aprender sobre o game. Pra quem curte um joguinho de survivor horror, vai se deleitar com esse game.

Not worth buying, this new update they released literally caused a major tunneling fest, the game is running like literally garbage on a 3060ti and just isn't enjoyable I feel both sides didn't deserve some of the reworks and don't give lame excuses over perks and alike for the changes it really feels barely playable especially since it runs the way it does and not to mention some of the changes are literally horrendous and literally made it more one sided I don't enjoy playing killer or survivor anymore it generally just isn't fun.

Con gli amici è molto divertente, ormai il prezzo basso fa si che sia una ottima alternativa per passare il tempo in compagnia. Hanno fixato e risolto tutti i problemi passati e sono molto attenti alle richieste della comunity.

EDIT: dopo altre 100 ore posso ancora garantire che con gli amici è un must, si rosika tantissimo e ti fa letteralmente avvelenare il fegato; ho delel registrazioni di amici che hanno spaccato la tastiera in live 10/10.

EDIT2: confermo che dopo più di 500 euro di gioco continua ad essere ancora molto divertente con gli amici. Ora stanno facendo un sacco di aggiornamenti interessanti. CONSIGLIATO.

I've reviewed this game before, but now that I've gotten older I am able to see this game as more so deceiving the killer in order to juke rather than just running and tricking survivors instead of wasting all my time hunting them in a straight line. I've come to respect the community that actually play the game and not just crouching down across the map while I've waited for 2 phases on hook and the other survivor is running for their life or camping the guy who held your attention for a minute or a few.

The game is pretty fun at low ranks but when you get higher up it gets to be more frustrating than anything, mostly for killers, because survivors are so much stronger, but some killers can still make the game not fun for survivors as well. overall if you dont take it too seriously it is a fun game and the devs put a lot of time into the game pushing out new content and updates as much as they can. their might be some issues but they generally do their best.

Ich komme immer wieder auf das Spiel zurück und finde es immer wieder gut bis mir auffällt, dass ich wieder viel zu viel zocke - oder ich auf ein anderes Spiel umsteige XD
Und jedes Mal bin ich dann wieder von den negativen Kommentaren überrascht... Es gibt natürlich Killer, die niemanden entkommen lassen. Manchmal mit Glück, manchmal mit Campen oder ähnlichem Mist und manchmal indem sie zu gut und dazu gut ausgestattet sind. Aber einerseits kenne ich noch kein Online-Spiel, bei dem jede Runde perfekt läuft, andererseits sind gute Killer auch immer eine gute Herausforderung und ich stürze mich begeistert in die nächste Runde =)

I was just vibing and steam asked me to leave a review so here you go
Cool concept + fun game to play with friends, but can be buggy and frustrating at times.

The game has its bugs and can be frustrating at times, but its a great game to play with friends and can feel very rewarding at times. It has a steep learning curve but do not let that throw you off of it. There are enough perks in the game to find a play style you like, so mix and match it up and find the build that fits you. I run a build that is all about teamwork on gens. Its not meta but you can do well with it. Overall a great game would recommend trying it out on a free weekend if you are wondering about it.

Сама идея весьма хороша, но реализация просто хуйня. Море доната и не косметического, многих персонажей нельзя купить не внося денег разрабам, а если нет перса, то и перки тоже не получить. Помимо доната присутствует много читеров, которых не банят почти никогда, и проблемы с пингом(которые разрабы обещали исправить, но нихуя),  проблемы эти возникают из-за того, что в лоби хост не на серверах разрабов, а на маньяке и если он находится далеко от вас, то удачи вам в побегушка от телепортирующегося мана. Если хотите купить, то помните-разрабам похуй на вас.
